name: Foto Sushi
review: It's great for gaming thanks to its low click latency and customizable CPI and polling rate.

name: Harps
review: It feels fairly well-built with its honeycomb design, and it's extremely light. But the sensor undershoots a fair amount when moving at a fast speed.

name: Jonas
review: It has extremely low click latency, a high maximum polling rate, and we can reprogram most of its buttons.
